fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each day, choose one of the following abilities that you haven't chosen yet. You gain that ability.
> - Be mean to someone, roleblocking them.
> - Stab someone in the aorta, dealing 37 Basic attacks to them.
> - Roleplay as Aiko, granting yourself Powerful defense for the night.
> - Speak French, confusing someone and redirecting them to a random target other than you.
> - Engage in incestuous polycule activities, getting investigative results (see post 35) for up to 3 other players as well as receiving' any night messages they get tonight.
> - Be antisocial, causing all non-attack visits against you to fail for the night.
> - Catch a Pokemon, increasing the number of votes you have by one.
> - Eat excessive amounts of sugar, allowing you to perform another one of your abilities an additional time.
- You may use any number of different abilities each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
